revised_title: Anatomy of Uterine Nervous Ganglia and Their Connections
tldr: The author, Robert Lee, examines the nervous ganglia of the uterus and their connections with the hypogastric and spermatic nerves. He describes four main plexuses under the peritoneum of the gravid uterus and their extensive connections. The study also includes observations by John Dalrymple on uterine nerves under a microscope, comparing them to nerves from the ganglionic system.
